description:
Location: Los Angeles, California or San Bruno, California

Job Type: Contract

Compensation Range: $45 - 55 per hour

We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Creative Project Manager to join our client's team and lead the creative process for their seasonal marketing campaigns!

This role is pivotal in managing cross-functional communications, workflows, and timelines to ensure the successful delivery of creative assets. The ideal candidate has a passion for managing complex projects and thrives in a fast-paced environment.

This is a hybrid role in which candidates must be local to Los Angeles or San Bruno.

Responsibilities:

  • Oversee the communication process for seasonal marketing campaigns, serving as the Senior Creative Project Manager for cross-functional partners such as Account Management, Marketing, Creative Operations, and the Creative team.
  • Lead and manage communications across departments, ensuring the effective exchange of campaign information and the dissemination of assets and deliverables.
  • Build and communicate timelines with partner deadlines and requirements for inputs, ensuring alignment with creative production deadlines, including integration into partner program calendars.
  • Understand and communicate effectively with art directors, copywriters, and photo and video resources, ensuring a smooth creative process.
  • Create and manage timelines across several different production teams, adapting to process changes as needed.
  • Jump in and take charge, leading projects with confidence and ensuring all deliverables are met on time.


Qualifications:

  • Experience level: Experienced
  • Up to 8 years of Creative Project Management experience.
  • 3 – 4 years of experience in Corporate Retail or another high-volume industry.
  • Proficiency in Workfront and experience overseeing omnichannel campaigns and projects.
  • Ability to adapt to process changes and manage multiple projects simultaneously in a fast-paced environment.


JOBID: 1062060

#PL

Equal Opportunity Employer: Race, Color, Religion, Sex, Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, National Origin, Age, Genetic Information, Disability, Protected Veteran Status, or any other legally protected group status.

At Cella, a randstad digital company, we welcome people of all abilities and want to ensure that our hiring and interview process meets the needs of all applicants. If you require a reasonable accommodation to make your application or interview experience a great one, please contact HRsupport@randstadusa.com.

Pay offered to a successful candidate will be based on several factors including the candidate's education, work experience, work location, specific job duties, certifications, etc. In addition, Cella by randstad digital offers a comprehensive benefits package, including health, an incentive and recognition program, and 401K contribution (all benefits are based on eligibility).

This posting is open for thirty (30) days.

Qualified applicants in San Francisco with criminal histories will be considered for employment in accordance with the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance.

We will consider for employment all qualified Applicants, including those with criminal histories, in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable state and local laws, including the City of Los Angeles' Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance.
